files.description: Publishes the v0.1 task taxonomy codebook as a machine-readable JSON artifact in the outputs directory.
Defines the JSON Schema for task annotations (v0.1) including required fields, enums, and cross-field constraints where possible.
Provides 5–10 example annotations in JSONL format that exercise categories and schema constraints for smoke testing.
Implements a CLI validator that loads the schema, validates JSON/JSONL annotations, and applies additional logical constraints not expressible in pure JSON Schema.
Runs a smoke test that validates the bundled example annotations against the schema and custom rules to prove constraints work in CI.

missionDescription: Publish task_taxonomy_codebook_v0.1 + annotation schema in /outputs, then create 5–10 example annotations and run the validator in CI (or a scripted smoke test) to prove the categories/constraints work.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
